Class.Name: MaritimeSituation
Class.Description: Enumerations and states of encounter situations that occur in shipping

Function.Name: regulate
Function.Description: Invokes a regulation event for a vessel

Function.Name: for_each_in_range
Function.Description: Helper funcation to evaluate vessel and other objects within a certain range

Function.Name: for_each_incident
Function.Description: Invoke a callback for each incident in a collection
